name: App Name
description: An interactive mental health companion app for students combining journaling, AI-powered mood prediction, gamification, and self-care tools.

sections.title: Tech Stack
items: Frontend: React Native, Unity / Phaser.js / Godot / React Native Canvas
AI & ML: Python, NLTK, Jieba, scikit-learn, optional PyTorch/TensorFlow, OpenAI API or open-source LLM
